jd: Hi, This is Praveena from GAC Solutions. Hope you are doing good. Role: Agile project ManagerLocation: Chicago Heights, IL (Onsite)Duration: Contract Job Description:- Planning and coordinating Agile projects from initiation to completion- Facilitating Agile ceremonies and promoting continuous improvement- Removing impediments and ensuring team productivity and efficiency- Managing project budgets, timelines, and resources- Communicating project progress and status to stakeholders- Assisting the team in achieving a high level of performance and quality- Holding teams responsible for their job and mentoring less experienced team members- Organizing and leading project status and working meetings- Preparing and distributing progress reportsManaging risks and issues and correcting deviations from plans- Working within cross-functional teams and ensuring each increment of functionality is potentially shippable -Thanks,Praveena KanakantiE: praveena@gacsol.comwww.gacsol.com‘Experts in Digitalization and Engineering - Enterprise 4.0’
